Entries.Introduction: You can see me..? Aces!#$b#I'm Charles, and this is Edwin. We're the Dead Boy Detectives.
Entries.cc_Begin: Been hearing a lot of noise from beneath the office lately. You done something, mate?
Entries.cc_Boulder: Have you seen all those sparking bits in the water lately? Weird.
Entries.cc_Bus: Heard you got that old bus fixed. Nice job!$h
Entries.cc_Minecart: You fixed up the minecarts, then? Now you can get around as easy as us ghosts mirror-hopping!$2.
Entries.cc_Complete: $hWow, the Community Center is looking better than ever!#$b#I just hope nobody is bothered by our office upstairs...
Entries.movieTheater: Did you see that there's a cinema opening in town?#$b#I can't wait to go.
Entries.firstVisit_Mine: Those old mines are spooky, aren't they? You look like the tough sort though.
Entries.GreenRainFinished: What was up with that green rain? Edwin 'n I have never seen anything like it, except for that time back in '09.
Entries.MovieInvite_Invited: You bought me a ticket to the cinema? I'd love to go!$
Entries.DumpsterDiveComment: Mate, if you need help, Edwin and I can look into it, yeah? You don't have to go digging in the bins.$2
Entries.FlowerDance_Decline: Would look kind of odd, wouldn't it, dancing with a ghost?
Entries.AcceptGift_(O)StardropTea: You mean I can actually drink this? Mate, this might be the best gift anyone's ever given me.$4
Entries.divorced: What do you want? I'm busy with a case.$5
Entries.Mon: You should come see the agency sometime. We've set up right above the old Community Center.#$b#$1Nobody ever comes in there, so they can't complain it's haunted if we're too loud.
Entries.Tue: You can tell us if you’ve got any supernatural mysteries that need solving, yeah?
Entries.Wed: You live on %farm, yeah? That's brills! I never tried gardening myself, but it must be aces growing your own food.
Entries.Thu: You seem pretty handy. Maybe you could help us out on a case sometime!
Entries.Fri: Edwin and I once solved a case on %farm. That was before you came to stay, though.
Entries.Sat: Do you go fishing very often? Careful not to fall in.$7
Entries.Sun: Other people might have the day off, but our work never stops, huh?$1
Entries.Mon2: I gotta get back to London one of these days for potion ingredients.#$b#Edwin gets moody when we're running low.
Entries.Tue2: Edwin isn't that good with people, but you have to cut him some slack.#$b#He spent seventy years in Hell, you know?$2
Entries.Wed2: Ever been down to Tragic Mick's? He's a good bloke, and he's got some absolutely insane items.
Entries.Thu2: Hey @! How are things on the farm?
Entries.Fri2: You know, we came to Pelican Town back in '06 to deal with some banshees. Yeah... Good times...
Entries.Sat2: I bet you can't beat my high score at Junimo Kart. I've been playing arcade games longer than you've been alive!
Entries.Sun2: We should hang around more! I could wear a disguise and you can pretend I’m an old uncle visiting.$h
Entries.Mon4: We should hang around more! Folks usually don’t see me, so it gets lonely sometimes.#$e#Uhh… Please don’t tell Edwin I said that.
Entries.Tue4: Hey, if you ever end up taking a trip to London, let me know! I'd be happy to show you around our usual haunts.$h
Entries.Wed4: You seem pretty handy. Maybe you could help us out on a case sometime!
Entries.Thu4: Have you ever been to Ginger Island? I hear it's proper warm there, like, all the time.
Entries.Fri4: You can tell us if you’ve got any supernatural mysteries that need solving, yeah?
Entries.Sat4: The agency is open on weekends too! Ghosts don’t really have to sleep or rest... Sigh... But I wish we would take breaks sometimes.
Entries.Sun4: Will you grow any tomatoes this summer? My mum used to make the best spaghetti sauce. #$b#$2I miss it so much...
Entries.Mon6: You can tell us if you’ve got any supernatural mysteries that need solving, yeah?
Entries.Tue6: Hey, @! Been down to the mines lately? It can be dangerous, but I love a good thrill.#$e#They don't call me the brawn for nothing.$u
Entries.Wed6: Let me know if you ever want to take a break and play some football. I've got one back at the office, and I've got rusty without anyone to play a proper match with.
Entries.Thu6: Do you go fishing very often? Careful not to fall in.$7
Entries.Fri6: I'm enjoying our time in Pelican Town!#$b#Especially since meeting such a good friend like you.$4
Entries.Sat6: The agency is open on weekends too! Ghosts don’t really have to sleep or rest... Sigh... But I wish we would take breaks sometimes.
Entries.Sun6: Last month we helped out an old ghost who was stuck in JojaMart. Can you imagine an eternity spent there?$7
Entries.Mon8: Did I ever tell you about the Case of the Creeping Mandrakes?#$e#Never mind, you look pretty busy right now. Some other time!$h
Entries.Tue8: You should come by the office sometime to hear about some cases we've solved.#$b#You never know when you might need to learn how to throw a hellhound off your scent.
Entries.Wed8: How are you and Edwin getting along, then? Good?
Entries.Thu8: Have you been to the Saloon lately? Gus' food always looks so good.#$e#Wish I could try some...
Entries.Fri8: I'm enjoying our time in Pelican Town!#$b#Especially since meeting such a good friend like you.$4
Entries.Sat8: Hey @! Say hi to %pet for me, would you?
Entries.Sun8: I had a gift I wanted to give you, but I lost it in my bag. Sorry, next time, yeah?$4
Entries.Mon10: If it isn't my favorite farmer, @! Need anything?
Entries.Tue10: I gotta say... Being here in Pelican Town has made feel the safest I've been in a long time...$#b#$4And you're a big part of that, @.
Entries.Wed10: I had a gift I wanted to give you, but I lost it in my bag. Sorry, next time, yeah?$4
Entries.Thu10: You should come by the office sometime to hear about some cases we've solved.#$b#You never know when you might need to learn how to throw a hellhound off your scent.
Entries.Fri10: Edwin's been too busy with research these days. His mind is brills, but sometimes I wish he took more breaks.
Entries.Sat10: The agency is open on weekends too! Ghosts don’t really have to sleep or rest... Sigh... But I wish we would take breaks sometimes.
Entries.Sun10: You know, you've been a real help to the town, @. Us included.
Entries.spring_1: Winter's finally over. Snow's nice and all, but it'll be good to see things 'round the valley growing again.
Entries.summer_1: You know, back when I was alive, summer was actually my least favorite season? I like it well enough now, though.
Entries.fall_1: Is fall as busy for you as it is for us?#$b#I dunno why, but it's like our caseload triples in the fall. Speaking of, gotta run!
Entries.winter_1: Cold out, innit? That's one good thing about being a ghost. I don't have to feel it anymore.$h
Entries.spring_12: Hey @! Excited for the Egg Festival tomorrow? 'S sorta like being a detective, innit, hunting for eggs instead of clues!
Entries.summer_10: I heard there's a Luau at the beach tomorrow. I don't hang around the ocean too much, but I might join!
Entries.summer_27: You know, I don't like the water much, but seeing the Moonlight Jellies tomorrow is definitely some kind of magic.
Entries.fall_15: Free food at the fair tomorrow! Sigh... I miss eating so much...
Entries.fall_26: I’m trying to convince Edwin to go in the Haunted Maze with me tomorrow. Maybe you'll have better luck.$h
Entries.winter_7: $7You're going to the Ice Festival tomorrow?#$b#Be careful...
Entries.winter_24: I'm so excited for tomorrow! I always feel like a little kid again when this time of year comes around.
